import {React, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './Nav.css' import MenuIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Menu'; function Nav() { const [toggle, settoggle] = useState(false) const Toggle = () =>{ settoggle(!toggle) console.log(toggle) } const closeMenu = () => { settoggle() } return (

) } export default Nav
